```{r setup}
library(modelCathRes)
library(dplyr, quietly = T, warn.conflicts = F)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Objective

> Validate the interpolation of cathode resistance with
> `findLogFunction()` with generated data

# Generated Data

```{r generateData}
#' generateCathRes
#' 
#' Makes fake cathode resistance value based on a + b log(age) 
#'
#' @param x  age of pot
#' @param a    a coefficient
#' @param b    b coefficient
#' @param error error added to output
#'
#' @return numeric
#' 
#'
#' 
generateCathRes <- function(x,
                            a = .6,
                            b = 0.02,
                            error = 0.02
                            ) {
  stopifnot(x > 0)
  return(a + b * log(x) + rnorm(1, 0 , error))
}

# generate df with data
age <- 1:2000
cath_res <- purrr::map_dbl(age, .f = generateCathRes)
df <- data.frame(
  age = 1:2000,
  cath_res = cath_res
)
```

# Validate Model

```{r validateModel}
# Plots data
ggplot(df, aes(x = age, y = cath_res)) +
  geom_point(shape = 21,
             fill = "white")+
  labs(title = "Generated Data")
# Validate model
findLogFunction(df,
                age = age,
                res = cath_res,
                coeff = T
                )
# Saves data for testing 
#write.csv(df, "../tests/testthat/generated_res_data.csv")
```
